Class CustomExchangeParams

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nordicid.nurapi.CustomExchangeParams

  • public class CustomExchangeParams
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean appendHandle
      The handle that is received from the tag singulation is appended to the bit stream.
      boolean asWrite
      Tells the module to behave as if this operation was a write operation.
      byte[] bitBuffer
      Bit data.
      static int MAX_TIMEOUT
      Maximum timeout in milliseconds to wait for a response.
      static int MIN_TIMEOUT
      Minimum timeout in milliseconds to wait for a response.
      boolean noRxCRC
      The receiver shall not decode the CRC.
      boolean noTxCRC
      The transmission shall contain no CRC.
      int rxLen
      Expected number bit in the response.
      boolean rxLenUnknown
      RX length is unknown; rxLen parameter will be ignored.
      boolean rxStripHandle
      Leave out the backscattered handle in the response.
      int rxTimeout
      Response wait timeout in ms (20...100).
      boolean txCRC5
      The transmission CRC shall be CRC-5 instead of CRC-16.
      int txLen
      Transmission length in bits.
      boolean txOnly
      The bit stream is only transmitted no response is expected.
      boolean xorRN16
      The RN16 received from the tag singulation is XOR'ed with the TX data in case the TX data length is 16 bits.

    • Field Detail

      • MIN_TIMEOUT

        public static final int MIN_TIMEOUT
        Minimum timeout in milliseconds to wait for a response.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MAX_TIMEOUT

        public static final int MAX_TIMEOUT
        Maximum timeout in milliseconds to wait for a response.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • txLen

        public int txLen
        Transmission length in bits. Initialized to 0.

      • rxLen

        public int rxLen
        Expected number bit in the response. Initialized to 0.

      • rxTimeout

        public int rxTimeout
        Response wait timeout in ms (20...100). Initialized to MIN_TIMEOUT. See also: MAX_TIMEOUT.

      • asWrite

        public boolean asWrite
        Tells the module to behave as if this operation was a write operation. Initialized to false.

      • appendHandle

        public boolean appendHandle
        The handle that is received from the tag singulation is appended to the bit stream. Initialized to true; in practice all commands rely on the use of the previously received RN16.

      • xorRN16

        public boolean xorRN16
        The RN16 received from the tag singulation is XOR'ed with the TX data in case the TX data length is 16 bits. Initialized to false.

      • txOnly

        public boolean txOnly
        The bit stream is only transmitted no response is expected. Initialized to false.

      • noTxCRC

        public boolean noTxCRC
        The transmission shall contain no CRC. Initialized to false.

      • noRxCRC

        public boolean noRxCRC
        The receiver shall not decode the CRC. The data is received 'as is'. Initialized to false.

      • txCRC5

        public boolean txCRC5
        The transmission CRC shall be CRC-5 instead of CRC-16. Initialized to false.

      • rxLenUnknown

        public boolean rxLenUnknown
        RX length is unknown; rxLen parameter will be ignored. Initialized to false.

      • rxStripHandle

        public boolean rxStripHandle
        Leave out the backscattered handle in the response. Initialized to false.

      • bitBuffer

        public byte[] bitBuffer
        Bit data.

        public CustomExchangeParams()

                 throws java.lang.Exception

      • getByteLength

        public static int getByteLength(CustomExchangeParams params)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Get required buffer size for parameters.
        Parameters:
        params - Parameters from which the size is calculated from.
        Returns:
        Number of byte required for serializing given parameters.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if parameters' TX length is 0 or negative.
